titleStmt.title: The lamentation of Troy, for the death of Hector Wherevnto is annexed an olde womans tale in hir solitarie cell.
titleStmt.author: Ogle, John, Sir, 1569-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Short for William Mattes,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: I.O., i.e. Sir John Ogle.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
